Class BattleEntityProperties

Handles numerous BattleEntity properties like weaknesses/resistances to certain Elements, and more.

Inheritance

BattleEntityProperties
Implements
ICleanup

ContactExceptions

The exceptions this entity has for certain types of contact against certain PhysicalAttributes.

This is used for Badges such as Spike Shield and Ice Power.

GetContactResult(BattleEntity, Enumerations.ContactTypes, Enumerations.ContactProperties)

Determines the result of contact, based on the type of contact made, when it's made with this entity.

Contacts that aren't a Success are prioritized over any Payback. If a ContactResult of Success is found, then the Payback for this entity is added if it exists and the ContactResult becomes a PartialSuccess.

Declaration
public ContactResultInfo GetContactResult(BattleEntity attacker, Enumerations.ContactTypes contactType, Enumerations.ContactProperties contactProperty)
Parameters
Type Name Description
BattleEntity attacker

The entity attacking this one
Enumerations.ContactTypes contactType

The type of contact made with this entity
Enumerations.ContactProperties contactProperty

The ContactProperty of the contact.
Returns
Type Description
ContactResultInfo

A ContactResultInfo containing the result of the interaction
| Improve this Doc View Source
